min3d.core
Class Object3dContainer

java.lang.Object
  min3d.core.Object3d
      min3d.core.Object3dContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObject3dContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Box, HollowCylinder, Rectangle, SkyBox, Sphere, TextObject, Torus
public class Object3dContainer
extends Object3d
implements IObject3dContainer

A Object3dContainer is a special object3d that can contain other object3d (called children.) The object3d container is the base class for layouts and objects containers.

Constructor Detail

Object3dContainer

public Object3dContainer()

Object3dContainer

public Object3dContainer(int $maxVerts,
                         int $maxFaces)
Adds container functionality to Object3d. Subclass Object3dContainer instead of Object3d if you believe you may want to add children to that object.

                                  MotionEvent ev,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<Object3d> list)
Pass the touch screen motion event down to the target object, or this object if it is the target.

Overrides:
dispatchTouchEvent in class Object3d
Parameters:

ev - The motion event to be dispatched
list - the touched object(ray intersected ones)
Returns:
